last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Murakami meets with Matsuda in Kohei's hospital room. Mayumi prepares to sue the government, and then asks Matsuda to come with her to meet someone.

name: The Journalist
overview: A journalist known as the maverick of news media defiantly chases the truth in this series adaptation of the hit movie of the same name.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Matsuda's editor pulls her off a dead-end corruption investigation to chase down malfeasance involving Eishin Academy. A cover-up begins.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Suzuki and his colleagues continue "revising" documents as Matsuda contacts potential sources and Murakami starts surveilling a list of targets.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Murakami investigates Matsuda's brother while the fallout from Suzuki's actions increases public interest in the case — and pressure on officials.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: With the announcement of the decision not to prosecute, Tada and his underlings instigate a smear campaign against Matsuda in the tabloids and online.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Matsuda seeks out Kurosaki to try to get more evidence; Murakami is severely reprimanded for digging too deep. Ryo applies for a job at Touto News.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Murakami meets with Matsuda in Kohei's hospital room. Mayumi prepares to sue the government, and then asks Matsuda to come with her to meet someone.
